response.overview: What happens when someone dies is that we, the living, contain their memory  ‘within us. [...] They will live on in us, and we will celebrate them. And dance like  ‘there is no tomorrow". Diane Torr . This is a dance dedicated to drag king and  ‘gender activist Diane Torr who passed away on the 31st of May 2017. A single  ‘shot, a single dance, a fusion of male and female energy, an ode to life and death.
response.title: This Dance Has No End
